entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning early this evening then changing to periods of ice pellets near midnight then changing to periods of light snow before morning. Risk of freezing rain and thundershowers this evening and overnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
